item.title: Running Docker on Mac with Colima
item.description: Goal: Replace Docker Desktop with Colima, a lightweight alternative for running Docker containers on Mac and Linux. Find Colima at https://github.com/abiosoft/colima Installation brew install docker-credential-helper docker brew install colima Start Colima colima start Verify Docker docker ps Fix Docker Socket Issues Some applications fail to connect with: Cannot connect to the Docker daemon at unix:///var/run/docker.sock. Is the docker daemon running? Set the correct socket path: export DOCKER_HOST=unix://${HOME}/.colima/default/docker.sock
